extendedInfo.description: Which Shakespearean character utters the famous phrase "to be or not to be, that is the question"? Did you know that Frankenstein, a gothic masterpiece,  was inspired by its authorâs frightening nightmare? What is the name of the novel by Jane Austen whose protagonist is Elizabeth Bennet?Show how much you know and learn with the quiz Genius - Literature!Test your knowledge and discover the easiest and most fun way of learning about the history of literature. An ingenious invention which the human being has used for more than five thousand years , to shape the imagination and let it fly.
